text: thumb|right|200px|Sorel in 1966 Jean Sorel (; born 25 September 1934) is a French actor. He was born in Marseille, France. From 1962 until her death in 2018, he was married to Anna Maria Ferrero. He is known for his roles in The Day of the Jackal (1973), Belle de Jour (1967) and One on Top of the Other (1969). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Marseille
title: Jean Sorel
